DESCRIPTION: Try your luck on gambling, you must have a higher number than the opponent.
YOUR_TURN: Your turn to roll the dice...
WIN: You have a higher number than the opponent, you won **{{cLogo}}{{amount}}**!
LOSE: The opponent have a higher number than yours, you lost **{{cLogo}}{{amount}}**.
TIE: You have the same number as the opponent, you lost **{{cLogo}}{{amount}}**.
